column1: | Down freight towards Southampton Central                                                                        | Up train passes from Eastern Docks         | 3#     |
| Down train passes towards Southampton                                                                           | Departure from Signal E842 towards Northam | 1$     |
| Down train from Southampton Up Yard towards                                                                     | Conflicting Down or Up train               | 3      |
| Depot Arrival/Departure Line or Eastern Docks                                                                   |                                            |        |
| Up ECS from Signal E842/Down Main crossing                                                                      | Conflicting Down train                     | 3      |
| to Up Fast/Up Slow/Northam Depot No. 1                                                                          |                                            |        |
| Up train from Signal E842 towards                                                                               | Conflicting Down train                     | 31⁄2   |
| Up freight crossing from Eastern Docks/Down                                                                     | Conflicting Down train                     | 31⁄2   |
| Up freight crossing from Eastern Docks to Up                                                                    | Up train passing to Up Fast                | 4      |
| # Increase to 31⁄2 minutes if first train is longer than 84 SLU / 540m.                                         |                                            |        |
| $ Increase to 2 minutes if the first movement is longer than 39 SLU / 250m.                                     |                                            |        |
| The maximum standage behind E840 signal clear of Chapel Road Level Crossing is 87 SLU / 560m. Longer trains     |                                            |        |
| from Eastern Docks booked to stop at Northam Junction will instead need to stop behind E838 signal to clear the |                                            |        |
| level crossing – this will block 580A points, preventing any movements between Northam Junction and the Depot   |                                            |        |
| Minimum reversal time at E842                                                                                   | Standard turnaround plus 2 minutes         |        |
| Down trains approaching Southampton do not require the standard {1⁄2} for crossing over at the London end       |                                            |        |
| crossovers as it is already included in the SRT’s.                                                              |                                            |        |
| Down trains crossing from Platforms 1,2 or 3 to                                                                 | Speed differential                         | {1⁄2}* |
| Down trains crossing from Platforms 1, 2 or 4 to                                                                | Speed differential                         | {1⁄2}* |
